verses.verse: A Psalm of David <S%H1732><s%>. I will praise <S%H3034><s%> thee with my whole heart <S%H3820><s%>: before the gods <S%H430><s%> will I sing praise <S%H2167><s%> unto thee.

I will worship <S%H7812><s%> toward thy holy <S%H6944><s%> temple <S%H1964><s%>, and praise <S%H3034><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%> for thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and for thy truth <S%H571><s%>: for thou hast magnified <S%H1431><s%> thy word <S%H565><s%> above all thy name <S%H8034><s%>.
In the day <S%H3117><s%> when I cried <S%H7121><s%> thou answeredst <S%H6030><s%> me, and strengthenedst <S%H7292><s%> me with strength <S%H5797><s%> in my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
All the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall praise <S%H3034><s%> thee, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, when they hear <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H561><s%> of thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
Yea, they shall sing <S%H7891><s%> in the ways <S%H1870><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: for great <S%H1419><s%> is the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
Though the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be high <S%H7311><s%>, yet hath he respect <S%H7200><s%> unto the lowly <S%H8217><s%>: but the proud <S%H1364><s%> he knoweth <S%H3045><s%> afar off <S%H4801><s%>.

Though I walk <S%H3212><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%>, thou wilt revive <S%H2421><s%> me: thou shalt stretch forth <S%H7971><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> against the wrath <S%H639><s%> of mine enemies <S%H341><s%>, and thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> shall save <S%H3467><s%> me.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> will perfect <S%H1584><s%> that which concerneth me: thy mercy <S%H2617><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>: forsake <S%H7503><s%> not the works <S%H4639><s%> of thine own hands <S%H3027><s%>.
